docs.snippet: A dramatic rally in digital currency bitcoin came to a spectacular end on Thursday with a plunge of up to 20 percent as China's yuan rose sharply - further evidence of an intriguing   inverse relationship between the pair....
docs.lead_paragraph: A dramatic rally in digital currency bitcoin came to a spectacular end on Thursday with a plunge of up to 20 percent as China's yuan rose sharply - further evidence of an intriguing   inverse relationship between the pair.

headline.main: Bitcoin Plunges as Much as 20 Percent as Chinese Yuan Soars
headline.print_headline: Bitcoin Plunges as Much as 20 Percent as Chinese Yuan Soars

docs.snippet: Senate Democrats on Thursday demanded an ethics probe into Tom Price, President-elect Donald Trump's pick for U.S. health secretary, following a report that the fierce Obamacare critic traded in healthcare company stocks while pushing legislation ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Senate Democrats on Thursday demanded an ethics probe into Tom Price, President-elect Donald Trump's pick for U.S. health secretary, following a report that the fierce Obamacare critic traded in healthcare company stocks while pushing legislation in Congress that could affect those shares.

headline.main: Democrats Demand Probe of Trump Health Nominee
headline.print_headline: Democrats Demand Probe of Trump Health Nominee

docs.snippet: Defending champion Agnieszka Radwanska lost in the quarterfinals of the Shenzhen Open on Thursday, falling to Alison Riske 6-2, 3-6, 6-0 a year after beating the American in the final....
docs.lead_paragraph: Defending champion Agnieszka Radwanska lost in the quarterfinals of the Shenzhen Open on Thursday, falling to Alison Riske 6-2, 3-6, 6-0 a year after beating the American in the final.

headline.main: Radwanska Loses in Quarterfinals at Shenzhen Open
headline.print_headline: Radwanska Loses in Quarterfinals at Shenzhen Open

docs.snippet: Suspected Kurdish militants on Thursday opened fire at police who stopped them at a checkpoint in the western city of Izmir before detonating their explosives-laden vehicle, the province's governor said. A policeman and a courthouse employee were ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Suspected Kurdish militants on Thursday opened fire at police who stopped them at a checkpoint in the western city of Izmir before detonating their explosives-laden vehicle, the province's governor said. A policeman and a courthouse employee were killed in the attack while two assailants were shot dead.

headline.main: 2 Killed in Car Bombing in Turkish City; 2 Attackers Dead
headline.print_headline: 2 Killed in Car Bombing in Turkish City; 2 Attackers Dead

docs.snippet: Mercedes-Benz is recalling nearly 48,000 SUVs in the U.S. to fix a sensor problem that could stop the front passenger air bag from inflating in a crash....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mercedes-Benz is recalling nearly 48,000 SUVs in the U.S. to fix a sensor problem that could stop the front passenger air bag from inflating in a crash.

headline.main: Mercedes Recalls About 48K SUVs to Fix Air Bag Sensor
headline.print_headline: Mercedes Recalls About 48K SUVs to Fix Air Bag Sensor

docs.snippet: Suspected Kurdish militants clashed with police and detonated a car bomb in western Turkey after their vehicle was stopped at a checkpoint, killing a police officer and a court employee....
docs.lead_paragraph: Suspected Kurdish militants clashed with police and detonated a car bomb in western Turkey after their vehicle was stopped at a checkpoint, killing a police officer and a court employee.

headline.main: Turkey: Suspected Kurdish Militants Kill 2 in a Car Bombing in Izmir
headline.print_headline: Suspected Kurdish Militants Kill Two in Car Bombing in Turkey's Izmir

docs.snippet: U.S. private employers added 153,000 jobs in December, fewer than in November, but the labor market remained solid, a report by a payrolls processor showed on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. private employers added 153,000 jobs in December, fewer than in November, but the labor market remained solid, a report by a payrolls processor showed on Thursday.

headline.main: Private Hiring Slows in December, Jobs Market Still Solid
headline.print_headline: Private Hiring Slows in December, Jobs Market Still Solid

docs.snippet: Former Chilean president Sebastian Pinera and independent centre-left Senator Alejandro Guillier have established themselves as the favourites to face off in the presidential election in November, two new polls showed on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Chilean president Sebastian Pinera and independent centre-left Senator Alejandro Guillier have established themselves as the favourites to face off in the presidential election in November, two new polls showed on Thursday.

headline.main: Ex-Chilean Leader Pinera, Senator Front-Runners for Presidency
headline.print_headline: Ex-Chilean Leader Pinera, Senator Front-Runners for Presidency

docs.snippet: Relegation-threatened Hull City appointed Portuguese manager Marco Silva on Thursday to replace the sacked Mike Phelan and take charge until the end of the Premier League season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Relegation-threatened Hull City appointed Portuguese manager Marco Silva on Thursday to replace the sacked Mike Phelan and take charge until the end of the Premier League season.
